articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's reminiscences printed in U.S.
    Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the United States brought out an English version of vol.8 (continuing edition) of part 1 the anti-Japanese revolution of President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With The Century" in New York.
 The federation has already published and distributed seven volumes of the reminiscences.
